name: Monstropolis by the Sea
description:
Welcome to Monstropolis! We have fun in the sun, a thriving night-life, and, occasionally, colossal migratory mega-beasts from the abyssal depths!

The population has been evacuated to behind the massive, protective shield wall.
Earn money from the bank to buy and upgrades expendable troops to throw at the advancing beasts to try to keep them at bay for as long as possible - if a monster breaches the walls, the city will be lost!

Made by Two Tims for Ludum Dare 43!
